name: Christmas Clicker: Idle Gift Builder
description:
Santa has gone missing and it's up to you to help the Elves and save Christmas!

Harvest resources like Snow and Magic, and build Workshops to upgrade your skills. You'll also need to build Sleighs that can find more resources, bring you more Elves, or hunt for Rare Artifacts!

Features
-Leaderboard system
-Strategy mixed with idle and tap mechanics.
-No pay to win or advertisements

Save Christmas in this winter themed idle game! Thanks for playing!
